Its actually a pretty big nerf to Kench damage as well since passive stacks mean nothing except stunning and devouring. No more extra damage from either. If you are looking for peel play Leona, Naut, or Alistar. In this case, "less annoying" means not viable if you hope to actually win your games and are not on a pro team.

Yes poppy needed the buffs, actually if you look at the total changes on the PBE you will notice a rather interesting theme which is a combination of anti healing, anti mobility, and shield break effects on multiple champions.

It looks like the balance team is finally working on fixing an issue they have been pretending does not exist for a long long time and thats a good thing.
they never stop with the renekton buffs. Renekton otps just one shot combo people all the time, even under tower.
As someone who plays Renekton he didn't need any buffs. This one however fucks Riven up so I'll still welcome it.

Mark my words, he will be B A D. You will lose every bottom lane match up, even against tanks because you won't be doing enough offensively or defensively. **_Not being able to devour after a stun will KILL this champion._** There is no where near enough compensation for what they are taking out.
honestly, it looks like they want to transition him to being a jungler.

You now want to give him 600 gold for every kill PLUS a major buff onto the damage? So much for nerfing solo lane pyke.

Being able to double the amount of gold your team gets from a kill is broken. Idk who or why the balance team, whom I normally defend in all cases, thought this was a good idea.
Those Pyke changes look a little overkill to be honest, I love him but they should probably tone back the scalings a bit. Maybe I'm wrong idk :p

Its a MASSIVE damage buff, even if he doesn't kill, the AD ratio, a *fucking TOTAL AD RATIO AT THAT* was just increased to, oh. . . ***220%*** of what it used to be!?  And the Lethality ratio went up too?  AND HE GETS TWICE AS MUCH FREE GOLD FOR NOT EVEN GETTING A KILL WITH IT.

Excellent changes RIOT, just fucking brilliant.

Gotta love those leona nerfs....
Not to mention they are adding more shield breakers into the game....

Does riot just hate support champions?
{{champion:555}} This is the ideal support pick. You may not like it, but this is what peak supporting looks li--PENTAKILL
Soooo pyke does more R damage by a LOT and gives twice as much gold. Well... No more penta dunk but one dunk means four kills worth of gold. Nice.
He gets gold on assists too now. He doesn't need to take the kills.

Its an execute. Pyke always got gold for the R not killing someone, he just got the cut instead of the most recent assister. This is giving Pyke 600 for doing either. 

If he gets the kill, he gets the kill gold + a "your cut". 
If he gets an assist, he gets the assist gold, plus 2 "your cut"'s.

There really isnt any room to defend this change. ESPECIALLY for a 50% win rate assassin.
Why did riot kill Leona's empowered attacks?  I thought they intentionally gave her that so she could do more in a team fight after casting her spells.

I don’t understand why all these drastic changes.

{{champion:58}} I thought we learned from Irelia that dealing bonus damage to shields is broken so why are we putting this on a lane bully that can just delete it instantly. Your just removing the counter play to this guy.

{{champion:240}} I don’t know how long Grevious Wounds usually last but why does he get a better version for 5 SECONDS! That’s gotta be the longest lasting debuff in the game! This isn’t giving a champion clearer strengths this is just removing counter play.

{{champion:53}} These changes were confusing to me but what the heck is that W, will his purpose be to just charge in super fast, pull someone and then die because he is rooted in front of the enemy team. Also even that R is ridiculous, like I said I thought Irelia proved shield breaking was op. Are we just repeating history?

{{champion:89}} Confused about this one. Does that W make her tankier or less Tanky?

{{champion:223}} WHAT THE ABSOLUTE HELL! If you wanted to nerf him, fine but why are you reverting his 9.9 changes and kicking even more with additional nerfs? Seriously what reason will players have to pick this guy? His issue was that he was too strong of a lane bully so you handle it by taking everything he has to function as a champion. Give him a break, he has been gutted for 3 seasons and gets to be playable for only 4 patches then gets gutted again. Oh but let’s not nerf the champions that are also problematic in top lane like Riven or Darius because we need more skins for them.

Excellent stuff.

The Renekton change makes absolutely no sense and I expect confusion...

Mostly though happy of the Tahm and Lux nerfs, nice Poppy buff,  good adjustments on Akali and Pyke.

renekton w changes are in line with riot's new philsophy

basically they used a lot of words to say that they want counterpicks to be a thing in league
which is why you  see leona having flat damage reduction, or poppy countering mobile champions even more, or ahri having her charm stopping dashes again, or kled having healing reduction on Q

What?!!

Didn't they have the philosophy of avoiding extreme counters to especially avoid impossible to win lanes? This feels the extreme opposite of the foundation of League. If I wanted that, I would play Dota instead...

I can see tho why most of these changes would reflect this philosophy. However, there are a few things I think you kinda overlook:

1) Leona is mainly played as a Support and she is mostly laning against ADCs which attack a ton of times with minimal damage for most of the game, so it makes sense to give her Damage Reduction to survive against them.

2) Ahri used to stop Dashes with her Charm some time ago (which received a lot of backlash from the community). Returning it is basically a revert.

3) Poppy basically traded one skill that was most of the times relevant at negating only one other skill, without really giving any reward to it. People with multiple mobility tools could basically try to engage and if Poppy W-ed, they would run away with their other tools, barely punished by a good Poppy W. Plus, I doubt she has room to be buffed in her other skills since I think she is almost good.

But I completely agree with you that Renekton, Blitzcrand and Kled changes are part of this new philosophy. They seem random and completely unnecessary. Irelia rework was the first "weird" thing, but looking back at it, she doesn't seem as bad as these after the changes.

That is EXACTLY the opposite of the foundations of league. 

This one thing is what was riots philosophy to never have a counterpick heavy gameplay and instead letting the players be able to play around a tough lane by being more skillfull and thus being able to win even against supposed counters. Riot now just shits all over that philosophy and frankly with how the game is at its core right now this is surely going to be the death of it. Stuff like toplane is already counterpick heavy now they make renekton and kled impossible to lane against for a bunch of champions. This is absolutely stupid and needs to get pulled ASAP.
I completely agree, this new direction may ruin the game we used to like.
I personally think that Renekton changes and poppy changes are aimed at providing more hardcounters for Riven, and champs like herself.
Yeah, if they go through with this change, Ren will 100% go back to being a good counter to Riven.

For those thinking Pyke changes are a nerf lets do some math shall we?

These are level 11 Values with +1 damage for no .XX number decimals. It is also ONLY with {{item:3147}} {{item:3134}} 

Live: Total Damage at level 11 with {{item:3147}} {{item:3134}} = 160 (Same value for changes coming.)
Lethality total at level 11 = 26


Live Ult Level 11 = 430 
Add 80% of 160 = 558 (Ult damage)
Add 150% Lethality = 597 (Ult Damage total.)

Changes coming ult at 11 = 350
Add 200% of 160 = 670 (Ult damage)
Add 200% of 26 = 722 (Ult total damage)

HUMMMMM big "nerf"
